GraduateCalendar - UndergraduateClass schedulesClass cancellationsCourse registrationImportant academic datesMore academic resourcesCampus servicesBook StopIT servicesJob opportunitiesSafety & preventionMental health supportStudent Service Centre (Birks)All campus servicesWhat's newCalendar of eventsLatest newsMedia RelationsFaculties, Schools & CollegesArts and ScienceGina Cody School ofEngineering and Computer ScienceFine ArtsJohn Molson School of BusinessSchool of Graduate StudiesAll Schools, Colleges & Departments.Information for...Future studentsCurrent studentsAlumni & friendsParentsFaculty & staffMediaSite searchConcordiaDirectoriesSearchStudent HubConcordia UniversityStudentsBirks homeBIRKS STUDENT SERVICE CENTREYour gateway to ConcordiaWe are available to assist you remotely or in person.Drop by our SGW office Monday to Friday from 10 a.m. to 4 p.m.Starting August 21 2023 by appointment only, all our services will be available on the Loyola Campus in the Georges P. Vanier Library. Appointment hours are Monday, Tuesday, and Friday, from 10 a.m. to 4 p.m.Make an appointment.Call us at 514-848-2424, ext. 2668 Monday to Thursday from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. orFriday from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. or, email us atstudents@concordia.ca.Consult the list of services offeredHow we can helpIf you have a block on your account, questions about a university policy or procedure, are unsure where to turn for your situation, or have any other questions, start with us. We’ll help you to understand the matter and make a plan to resolve it.LOCATIONSGW Campus(Walk-ins only)RoomLB-185J.W. McConnell Building1400 De Maisonneuve Blvd. W.Loyola Campus(By appointment only)Georges P. Vanier LibraryVanier Library Building(First floor)7141 Sherbrooke St. W.REACH USTel: 514-848-2424, ext. 2668Fax: 514-848-4507Email:students@concordia.caHOURS OF OPERATIONIn person service:SGW CampusMonday to Friday10 a.m. – 4 p.m.(LOY Campus -by appointment only)By phone:514-848-2424Monday to Thursday9 a.m. – 5 p.m.Friday10 a.m. – 5 p.m.RELATED OFFICESOffice of the RegistrarFinancial Aid & Awards OfficeInternational Students OfficeExams OfficeSchool of Graduate StudiesBack to top© Concordia UniversityStudent HubUndergraduateGraduateMy coursesMy CU accountServices & resourcesStudent lifeAbout the Student HubEventsResourcesNew ConcordiansInternational studentsIndigenous studentsBlack studentsStudents with disabilitiesStudent parentsLifelong learnersContact Concordia514-848-2424Find supportStudent Success CentreHealth & WellnessTuition & Financial AidIT supportSecurity & emergency servicesGeneral helpBirks Student Service CentreAcademic advisingTerritorial acknowledgementConcordia University is located on unceded Indigenous lands. Learn about the different options available to you on your ongoing mental health and wellness journey.Mental health appointmentsSelf-help toolsPhone & text supportAddiction & substance useReview your insurance coverageCounselling & Psychological ServicesCounselling and Psychological Servicescan help you manage a variety of mental health concerns such as stress, anxiety and depression. Our team of licensed psychologists provides short-term psychotherapy, as well as workshops, events and outreach to promote mental health and well-being at Concordia.UnderOrdre des Psychologues du Québec (OPQ) guidelines, appointments are only available to students residing in Quebec.Our servicesAccess servicesPoliciesContact usFind your communityOverall well-being begins with connection. Find a supportive community of peers across Concordia and connect to wellness with our Zen Dens - on-campus and online.Community supportZen DensBe there for othersLearn how you can support someone who is struggling with their mental health and help reduce stigma in your community. Staff and faculty: find resources if you are concerned abouta studentora colleague.Resources for allResources for facultyFeatured mental health articlesThe expressions of being aloneTheory, research and exercises about the experiences of solitude and loneliness.5 steps to manage stressExplore our five-step guide to stress managementStrategies for building good mental healthCheck out these 11 strategies to enhance your mental healthView all articlesMental health & wellness eventsNOV28Embodied mindfulness - In-personToday, 11 a.m. – 12 p.m.NOV28Art of self-care: Drop-in art therapy groups - In-personToday, 12 p.m. – 1:30 p.m.NOV29Sound bath with Irene Feher - In-personTomorrow, 12 p.m. – 12:30 p.m.Explore all health & wellness eventsBack to top© Concordia UniversityHealth & WellnessEmergency & crisis resourcesMedical careMental healthAccessibilityHealthy livingArticlesUseful linksMedical appointmentsMental health appointmentsHealthy living counsellingInsuranceEventsOur servicesHealth Services ClinicCounselling & Psychological ServicesAccess Centre for Students with DisabilitiesZen DensTerritorial acknowledgementConcordia University is located on unceded Indigenous lands.
